column2: I went with my boyfriend for Valentine's Day.  We went on the Friday before V-Day
column4: but I had a reservation and was seated quickly.  The waiter was nice and let us have plenty of time to decide
column5: since my boyfriend had never been here before.  We started with the artisan cheeses and the baked goat cheese.  The artisan cheeses were good
column6: but probably not something I would order again considering all the other wonderful things on the menu.  The goat cheese is absolutely DIVINE.  One of the best things I think I've ever had- creamy goat cheese surrounded in a red tomato sauce.  I was skeptical about this at first
column7: but I'm so glad I got it.
